thread.title: Presupuesto 2018 sin subir impuestos ni crear nuevos: Gobernadora Pavlovich
thread.title_full: Presupuesto 2018 sin subir impuestos ni crear nuevos: Gobernadora Pavlovich

posts.author: El Regional
posts.title: Presupuesto 2018 sin subir impuestos ni crear nuevos: Gobernadora Pavlovich
posts.text: Presupuesto 2018 sin subir impuestos ni crear nuevos: Gobernadora Pavlovich Compartir ! tweet Hermosillo, Sonora, noviembre 6 de 2017.- Sin nuevos impuestos ni incrementar los existentes, el Gobierno de Sonora realizará los ajustes necesarios para que el paquete económico del Ejercicio Fiscal 2018 rinda de la mejor forma, aseguró la Gobernadora Claudia Pavlovich Arellano. El presupuesto del próximo año no contempla nuevos impuestos ni el aumento de los que ya se tienen, por lo que, dijo, se efectuarán ajustes para mantener el desarrollo de la entidad. “Por supuesto no se está subiendo ningún impuesto y obviamente va a implicar un recorte importante en algunas áreas, con excepción de las áreas claves, que son educación, salud, seguridad, pero sí en muchas otras cosas”, explicó. Una de las propuestas, agregó la Gobernadora Pavlovich, es mejorar la eficacia de cubrir el cobro de impuestos y derechos, generando mecanismos más cómodos para los ciudadanos. “Lo que sí les digo a la Subsecretaría de Ingresos es que sean más eficaces a la hora de cobrar, dar mayor facilidad, que se hagan más trámites en línea, que haya más facilidad para pagar y ampliar la base”, indicó. 2017-11-06

thread.title: Comando tirotea en velorio y deja cuatro muertos en Guanajuato
thread.title_full: Comando tirotea en velorio y deja cuatro muertos en Guanajuato

posts.author: AFP
posts.title: Comando tirotea en velorio y deja cuatro muertos en Guanajuato
posts.text:
Foto: pixabay.com
Comando tirotea en velorio y deja cuatro muertos en Guanajuato AFP Justicia
Un grupo armado atacó a tiros a los asistentes a un velatorio dejando a cuatro muertos y tres lesionados en el estado de Guanajuato, que enfrenta un aumento de la violencia del crimen organizado, informaron este lunes autoridades locales.
El incidente se registró la noche del domingo antes de las 22h00 locales cuando la policía del municipio de Yuriria recibió los primero reportes de personas lesionadas.
Al interior de la vivienda se encontraron cuatro cadáveres, "3 de sexo masculino y uno de sexo femenino en cuya identificación estamos trabajando en estos momentos", informó a periodistas Israel Aguado, funcionario de la fiscalía local.
Las personas velaban el cuerpo de Julio César Torres, otro presunto delincuente conocido como "El Ñoño", quien había sido asesinado dos días antes.
Aguado confirmó además que hay dos menores de edad entre los lesionados.
Detalló que, según los testimonios recabados por los investigadores, al lugar llegó un grupo de hombres encapuchados en varios vehículos y se introdujeron al inmueble en donde velaban el cuerpo.
En el lugar se encontraron más de 50 casquillos de diversos calibres, además de algunas balas deformadas.
Guanajuato, uno de los estados que concentra la actividad del vibrante sector manufacturero mexicano orientado a la exportación, es disputado por los poderosos cárteles Jalisco Nueva Generación, Sinaloa y Los Zetas, según autoridades de seguridad.
En septiembre fueron asesinadas ocho personas, entre ellas cuatro policías, y en agosto, tres policías de Salamanca fueron secuestrados y posteriormente ultimados. Además, el director de la policía de Celaya fue asesinado junto con su guardia de seguridad.

thread.title: "Papá me ha dicho que le va a cortar el cuello a mamá"
thread.title_full: "Papá me ha dicho que le va a cortar el cuello a mamá" | Ideal

posts.author: EUROPA PRESS
posts.title: "Papá me ha dicho que le va a cortar el cuello a mamá"
posts.text:
Nacional "Papá me ha dicho que le va a cortar el cuello a mamá" Manuel R.M. acusado del asesinato de su exmujer María del Castillo Vargas, hija de la cantaora Juana Vargas. / EFE El desgarrador elato hijo de María del Castillo Vargas, asesinada por su marido con 40 puñaladas EUROPA PRESS Martes, 7 noviembre 2017, 09:19 
Manuel R.M., el hombre acusado de asesinar de 40 puñaladas en diciembre de 2015 en la localidad sevillana de Lebrija a su expareja, la hija menor de la cantaora flamenca Juana Vargas, ha pedido este lunes "perdón" a la familia de la víctima y ha asegurado estar "muy arrepentido" por lo sucedido. 
Durante la quinta sesión del juicio con jurado popular que se está celebrando en la Audiencia Provincial de Sevilla, el acusado ha hecho así uso de su derecho a la última palabra después de que la Fiscalía, las acusaciones que ejercen la familia de la fallecida y la Junta y la defensa del imputado hayan expuesto sus informes finales. 
En este sentido, tanto el Ministerio Público como las dos acusaciones solicitan para el acusado 25 años de cárcel por un delito de asesinato ; tres años por un delito de maltrato habitual; dos años de cárcel por un delito de allanamiento de morada, y un año de prisión por un delito de quebrantamiento de medida cautelar. 
"Se ensañó con ella, sólo dos de las puñaladas eran mortales, el resto eran gratuitas, no eran necesarias" 
La pasada semana, cabe recordarlo, la Fiscalía modificó su escrito de conclusiones provisionales en el sentido de precisar que las puñaladas mortales propinadas por el acusado a la víctima no tuvieron lugar en el interior de su vivienda, sino en la calle, tal y como determinaron los médicos forenses que practicaron la autopsia al cadáver. 
Frente a las peticiones de las acusaciones, la abogada del acusado ha solicitado que se le condene por un delito de homicidio y no de asesinato con tres atenuantes, como son las de actuar bajo los efectos de las drogas; arrebato u obcecación, pues actuó movido por los "celos", y confesión, ya que se habría entregado a la Policía tras cometer el crimen . 
En su informe final, la Fiscalía ha defendido que el imputado ha cometido un delito de asesinato y no de homicidio "porque hay alevosía y ensañamiento", ya que "hubo un ataque súbito e inesperado" y el acusado, al propinarle 40 puñaladas, le causó un "dolor innecesario". 
"Se ensañó con ella, sólo dos de las puñaladas eran mortales, el resto eran gratuitas, no eran necesarias", ha precisado. 
Al hilo, se ha opuesto a las tres atenuantes alegadas por la defensa, y sobre el arrebato u obcecación ha dicho que "los celos no pueden justificar ninguna atenuación, porque si lo hiciéramos estaríamos justificando el 100 por cien de los crímenes machistas" que se producen en España. Temas

posts.author: littlePros (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Factors To Consider In Choosing An Appropriate School Offering Chandler Affordable Music Lessons
posts.text:
By Deborah Cook 

Results associated with any training are meant to satisfy the expectations of the receiving individual. To make this a reality, a learner is to consider all the factors that affect those outcomes. The school in which the training takes place is one of those factors which affect the outcome of training. One is advised to use criteria fit for selection of the best school to attend effective classes. The following are things which determine the choice of a right school for Chandler affordable music lessons .

The tutors who are involved in the teaching process. You should determine the type of professionals offering the teaching. These affect the content that is passed to the learners. They must be qualified and with ownership of the right certificates to assure you of effective teaching and learning. Their knowledge should not be limited to a certain type of music rather it should encompass on the whole dimension of a course.

School curriculum. The curriculum which the school follows should match the content knowledge you want to obtain. There are different curriculum types, and different schools follow them differently. The curriculum also points out the way of delivering and the kind of knowledge that is supposed to be passed from the teacher to the learner. Choosing the ideal one, therefore, will ensure you meet your interests.

The amount of money required. The particular school should have prices which fall on your affordability level. Determine the amount of money you have to meet the requirement and make sure the money rhymes with the cost of the school. Know other services which are required for the attainment of particular course and their prices. Know if they are offered on the total cost or if they are catered separately by individuals.

Tools and learning equipment used. The learning equipment should be appropriate for the course content. They also need to match with the current technology. This ensures that the learner learns the right skill and of high quality. It also makes sure that the learner is well equipped to handle all the type of tools and technology involved in the career field.

Time factor. Seasons, course duration, lesson time and the time of the day which learning is programmed to take place are some of the important factors one is supposed to consider in this time factor. These all should be appropriate with what the individual learner expects. This will make sure you are well prepared to attend classes because you are available and comfortable with the time which the course is offered.

The program which the school follows. Some schools are programmed to operate during the day only and others both during the day and at night. In the day programmed schools, the students are day scholars and those for full time, all students are boarders. Choose the one that meets your specifications and the time you want the learning to occur.

Class size. This also should affect your selection. Ensure the size of classes that the school provide is as small as possible. This is important for appropriate and effective teaching and learning process. The fewer the people in the class, the more the lesson will be effective.




About the Author:

When you are searching for the facts about Chandler affordable music lessons , come to our web pages today. More details are available at http://www.becklemusicstudio.com now.

thread.title: ホクノーが「健康ステーション」開設、食品スーパーが地域住民の健康拠点に
thread.title_full: ホクノーが「健康ステーション」開設、食品スーパーが地域住民の健康拠点に

posts.author: hre-admin
posts.title: ホクノーが「健康ステーション」開設、食品スーパーが地域住民の健康拠点に
posts.text:
札幌市厚別区で食品スーパーを展開しているホクノー（本社・札幌市厚別区）は６日、旗艦店の「中央店」（もみじ台北７丁目１―２）２階に地域住民の健康をサポートする「健康ステーション」を開設した。経済産業省の健康寿命延伸産業創出推進事業の一環で、高齢化率の高いもみじ台地区の住民の健康増進を後押しする。来年２月17日まで３ヵ月間開設して成果を検証したうえで常設の可能性を探る。（写真は、開所式で行われた関係者によるテープカット。中央がホクノーの野地秀一社長） 
ホクノーが開設した「健康ステーション」は、食や健康などをテーマにした様々な講座や運動教室の提供、定期的に行う医師や保健師による健康相談、高齢者の困りごとを住民同士で解決する「お助け隊」など、もみじ台地区の高齢者が健康で安心して暮らせるように後押しする拠点。 
凸版印刷のスキームを活用してホクノーが中心になり、シニア関連事業を進めるポロワッカ（本社・札幌市中央区）や地域の自治会、地域の医療機関などが協力して実践する。経産省の補助事業に認定されており、補助金を活用するため実施するサービスはすべて無料。 
中央店２階の旧ゲームコーナーを利用して専用カウンターを設け、健康相談ができる個別ブースも設置。また講座を開く教室も用意した。 
この日行われた開所式には関係者や地域住民ら約１００人が参加。ホクノーの野地秀一社長は、「もみじ台地区の高齢化率は44・８％で多くの方が独居。こうした方々の健康維持にはバランスの良い食事と適度な運動が必要。健康ステーションを気軽に利用してもらい、健康に関心を持ってもらうとともにコミュニケーションの場としても利用してもらいたい」と挨拶した。 
また、もみじ台自治連合会の東健二郎会長は、「この取り組みは住民もスーパーもＷｉｎＷｉｎの関係になる。大いに活用して、地域住民が集まる場になればと願う。市内では最も高い高齢化率の地区なので、将来的には社会福祉や困りごとなど全て情報が得られる、もみじ台地区の社会福祉ステーションになれば素晴らしい」と述べた。 
その後、関係者によるテープカットが行われ、参加者全員で椅子に座ったまま手軽にできる体操で汗を流した。なお、ホクノーは、スマートフォンのアプリで歩数に応じて健康ポイントを付与、ホクノーのポイントと合算して買い物に使えるようする。（開所式を記念して参加者全員で椅子に座ったままでできる体操も行なった＝写真）

thread.title: As election looms, allegations of vote-tampering arise in Malaysia
thread.title_full: As election looms, allegations of vote-tampering arise in Malaysia

posts.author: Lee Lian Kong
posts.title: As election looms, allegations of vote-tampering arise in Malaysia
posts.text:
As election looms, allegations of vote-tampering arise in Malaysia Share this on By Lee Lian Kong | 7th November 2017 
Malaysia's Prime Minister Najib Razak presents the 2018 budget at the parliament house in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia October 27, 2017. Source: Reuters/Lai Seng Sin 
AN independent poll watchdog is alleging fraud by the country’s Election Commission (EC) after further investigations reveal more army personnel have been registered as voters in military bases that have yet to be completely built. 
Bersih 2.0, a coalition for free and fair elections, claims that the EC is fully aware of this illegal transfer of army personnel voters to the incomplete army bases, which are all located at seats where the ruling Barisan Nasional leaders had won with only thin majorities in the previous general election. 
“The EC had actually set up localities for these new camps,” Bersih 2.0’s co-chairman Maria Chin Abdullah, told a press conference in Kuala Lumpur today. “This means the EC was very much aware of what it’s doing.” 
The coalition said the EC had failed to check whether these army bases are valid locations to register voters in as provided for under Regulation 13 of the Election (Voter Registration) Rules 2002 . The EC has yet to respond to these allegations. Bersih 2.0 wants the Election Commission to come clean about the transfer of soldier voters to army bases that have yet to be built. Source: Bersih 2.0 

Last week, opposition party the Democratic Action Party (DAP) had called for the 1,051 military personnel and their spouses – who have been revealed to be registered voters at an incomplete camp in the Segamat constituency in Johor – to be removed. 
Defence Minister Hishammuddin Hussein has denied this claim, saying it makes “no sense” to transfer servicemen and their spouses there without preparing housing for them as those sent there will not vote for the ruling party then. 
Malaysia’s 14th general elections are due to be held by August 2018, but can be called earlier. 
An opposition state assemblyman today showed photos of a construction notice board which had shown the army base in Segamat would only be complete by April 2018. Recent photos taken at the construction site show the said board has been removed. 
SEE ALSO: Cambodia amends election law ahead of 2018 polls 
Following this, the coalition’s further investigation had revealed that 1,234 and 1,411 army voters have been transferred to as yet-to-be-built army bases at Bera and Hutan Melintang respectively. Both parliamentary seats were won by Barisan Nasional ministers with a slim majority of around 2,000 votes in the 13th general election. Construction notice board for the army base at Bera, Pahang show that the base is due to complete in July 2018. Source: Bersih 2.0 
“This is politically motivated and done to influence election results by postal or early voting,” Bersih 2.0 deputy chairperson Shahrul Aman said. 
Under Malaysian law , a person can only be registered as a voter if he is at least 21 years of age and residing in the constituency. Bersih 2.o deems the incomplete army bases as insufficient to qualify as a form of “residence” and as such, the transfer of army voters and their spouses there an “electoral offence” as per Section 3(A) of the Electoral Offences Act 1954, which should be investigated by the police and the Attorney-General’s office. 
The coalition also called for the immediate resignation of the EC head, an explanation for these transfers by the EC and the Defence Ministry, as well as for the transfers to be cancelled before the voter registry is gazetted. {"total":3,"error":"","stumbleupon":0,"pinterest":0,"google":0,"facebook_total":2,"buffer":1,"twitter":0,"linkedin":0,"vk":0}

posts.title: Lisenin kalorifer kazanı patladı: 1 ölü, 6 yaralı
posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Lisenin kalorifer kazanı patladı: 1 ölü, 6 yaralı Zonguldak’ın Çaycuma ilçesinde bir lisenin tek katlı kazan dairesinde meydana gelen patlamada okulun hizmetlisi Selahattin Köse yaşamını yitirdi. Okulun müdürü, 4 öğrenci ve bir hizmetli yaralandı. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 10:56   @BursaHaberMedya 
Zonguldak’ın Çaycuma ilçesinde bir lisenin tek katlı kazan dairesinde meydana gelen patlamada okulun hizmetlisi Selahattin Köse yaşamını yitirdi. Okulun müdürü, 4 öğrenci ve bir hizmetli yaralandı. 
Edinilen bilgiye göre olay sabah 07.50 sıralarında Çaycuma ilçesi Pehlivanlar Mahallesi’ndeki Mesleki ve Endüstri Meslek Lisesi’nin bahçesindeki tek katlı kalorifer dairesinde yaşandı. Okul saatine yakın bir vakitte lisenin kalorifer kazanı görevlilerce yakıldı. 
Kazanın yakılmasından bir süre sonra büyük bir gürültü yaşandı. Patlamayla birlikte fırlayan kalorifer dairesinin demir kapısı bahçede bulunan servis aracına çarptı. Servis aracında maddi hasar meydana geldi. Patlamayla birlikte kalorifer dairesinin duvarı da yıkıldı. 
Lisede hizmetli olarak görev yapan Selahattin Köse duvarın altında kalarak yaşamını yitirdi. Ekiplerin çalışmasıyla duvarın altından çıkartılan Köse’nin yaşamını yitirdiği belirlendi. Patlama nedeniyle okul müdürü Ali G., kalorifer dairesi görevlisi Süleyman K., 4 öğrenci yaralandı. 
Yaralılar olay yerine gelen ambulanslarla Çaycuma Devlet Hastanesi’ne kaldırıldı. Tedavi altına alınan yaralıların sağlık durumlarının iyi olduğu öğrenildi. Okulda ise bir günlük eğitim ve öğretime ara verilirken öğrenciler okulu boşalttı. 
Büyük bir gürültünün yaşandığı olay yerindeki araçlarda maddi hasar meydana geldi. Lise binasının camları kırıldı. Olayla ilgili soruşturma başlatıldı. Öte yandan görevlerini yapmak isteyen gazeteciler Cumhuriyet Savcısı’nın talimatıyla aracı bindirilerek polis merkezine götürüldü. Gazetecilerin telefonlarına da el konuldu. Gazeteciler bir süre sonra polis merkezinden serbest bırakıldı. 1

posts.text: [스포츠조선 김영록 기자]걸스데이 혜리가 어둠속에서도 빛나는 미모를 과시했다. 혜리는 7일 자신의 SNS에 "#ready_set_style"이라는 글과 함께 사진을 올렸다. 사진 속 혜리는 비스듬한 각도로 선 채 고개를 돌려 카메라를 바라보고 있다. 혜리는 뾰로통하니 무뚝뚝한듯 애교 있는 표정이고, 웨이브진 머리는 자연스럽게 흘러내려져있다. 혜리는 오는 27일 방영 예정인 MBC 새 월화극 '투깝스'에서 조정석과 남녀주인공으로 출연 예정이다. lunarfly@sportschosun.com
